meanings.definition: A construction toy consisting of wooden sticks and spools.
meanings.sent1: I built a tall tower using my tinkertoy set.
meanings.sent2: Children enjoy playing with tinkertoys to create different structures.
meanings.sent3: The tinkertoy pieces danced around the room as the child played.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was a box of tinkertoys, ready to build anything.
meanings.sent5: The tinkertoy construction stood proudly on the table.

meanings.definition: To tinker with or adjust something in a playful manner.
meanings.sent1: He liked to tinkertoy with old gadgets to see how they worked.
meanings.sent2: She would often tinkertoy with her bike to make it run smoother.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to tinkertoy with the yarn ball, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: His mind began to tinkertoy with the idea of starting a new project.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic would tinkertoy with the engine until it purred like a kitten.
